verses.verse: "Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH5892> 'Assign the cities of refuge,<WH4733> of which I spoke<WH1696> to you<WH5414> by<WH3027> Moses,<WH4872>

that the manslayer<WH7523> who kills<WH5221> any person<WH5315> accidentally<WH7684> or unintentionally<WH1847> may flee<WH5127> there.<WH4733> They shall be to you for a refuge from the avenger<WH1350> of blood.<WH1818>

He shall flee<WH5127> to one<WH259> of those cities,<WH5892> and shall stand<WH5975> at the entrance<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> of the city,<WH5892> and declare<WH1696> his cause<WH1697> in the ears<WH241> of the elders<WH2205> of that city.<WH5892> They shall take<WH622> him into the city<WH5892> with them,<WH5414> and give him a place,<WH4725> that he may live among them.<WH3427>

If the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> him,<WH5462> then they shall not deliver up the manslayer<WH7523> into his hand;<WH3027> because he struck<WH5221> his neighbor<WH7453> unintentionally,<WH1097> and didn't<WH8130> hate him before.<WH8543>

He shall dwell<WH3427> in that city<WH5892> until he stands<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> for judgment,<WH4941> until the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> that<WH834> shall be in those days.<WH3117> Then the manslayer<WH7523> shall return,<WH7725> and come<WH935> to his own city,<WH5892> and to his own house,<WH1004> to the city<WH5892> he fled from.<WH5127>'"

They set apart<WH6942> Kedesh<WH6943> in Galilee<WH1551> in the hill country<WH2022> of Naphtali,<WH5321> Shechem<WH7927> in the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim,<WH669> and Kiriath Arba<WH7153> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>) in the hill country<WH2022> of Judah.<WH3063>

Beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho<WH3405> eastward,<WH4217> they assigned<WH5414> Bezer<WH1221> in the wilderness<WH4057> in the plain<WH4334> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> Ramoth<WH7216> in Gilead<WH1568> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> and Golan<WH1474> in Bashan<WH1316> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh.<WH4519>

These were the appointed<WH4152> cities<WH5892> for all the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and for the alien<WH1616> who lives<WH1481> among<WH8432> them,<WH5221> that whoever kills any person<WH5315> unintentionally<WH7684> might flee<WH5127> there,<WH4191> and not die by the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood,<WH1818> until he stands<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation.<WH5712>
